author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Use the values specified in the options PSet or the default of 1 thread when using the CmsRun python class.

The code used to handle the threading options was refactored into stand alone functions.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Ran a simple test configuration using different numbers of threads specified in the configuration within gdb and watch how many threads were created.
title: Properly set number of threads in CmsRun python module
